name: Un-Drop
description:
A score based game about not dropping a thing.

EPILEPSY WARNING: LOTS OF BRIGHT COLOURS THAT FLASH A WHOLE LOT

Version Differences:

Version 1 - flashier colours all around with a brighter target object

Version 2 - most painful to the eyes

Version 3 - border is a solid fading colour

Version 4 - border is chunky, like V1 and V2, but fades like V3 (RECOMMENDED)

Made for Weeky Game Jam #18
